headline: The Trade Desk Launches Smart TV Operating System
summary: The advertising giant plans to sell software to TV device makers.

raw.headline: The Trade Desk Launches Smart TV Operating System
raw.summary: The advertising giant plans to sell software to TV device makers.

headline: Why Are The Trade Desk (TTD) Shares Soaring Today
summary: Shares of advertising software maker The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) jumped 5% in the afternoon session after the company announced it is developing a new connected TV operating system (OS) called Ventura and plans to launch it as early as 2025. The Trade Desk intends to partner with smart TV original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and other streaming TV aggregators to deploy Ventura. headline: Roku down after media report that Trade Desk plan for TV operating system
summary: Investing.com - Shares of Roku Inc (NASDAQ:ROKU) dropped as much as 8% in Wednesday after reports that digital advertising firm The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) was planning to launch a connected TV operating system by the second half of 2025.

raw.headline: Roku down after media report that Trade Desk plan for TV operating system
raw.summary: Investing.com - Shares of Roku Inc (NASDAQ:ROKU) dropped as much as 8% in Wednesday after reports that digital advertising firm The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) was planning to launch a connected TV operating system by the second half of 2025.

headline: The Trade Desk Announces Ventura, a Revolutionary Streaming TV Operating System
summary: VENTURA, Calif., November 20, 2024--The Trade Desk (NASDAQ: TTD) today announced that it has developed Ventura, an innovative new streaming TV operating system (OS). The Trade Desk will partner with smart TV original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and other streaming TV aggregators to deploy Ventura.
